item.description:
Ready to Laugh your ass off - Come join the Wedelns as we head over to Jose Murphy's in Worcester to enjoy Wisecracks Comedy on Saturday February 12. The show starts at 8 - but lets meet at 7 for drinks and a bite to eat.

BTW - there is a Groupon in Worcester for $6... Use the link below to get your Groupon to redeem for this event.



I'll probably be skiing at Wachusett earlier in the day, then after cleaning up a bit, head over to Jose Murphy's.

Please note - our big President's Day weekend up at Wedeln Ski and Outdoors Club will be held the following weekend. It would be great if you met up with us at this event and then came up to ski President's day weekend.

Here are some links:

Groupon

Wisecracks Comedy Club

Jose Murphy's Worcester

Note - Please RSVP once you have received your Groupon...

Please feel free to contact me if you have any questions, issues, or concerns.

Regards,
Jonathan
item.how_to_find_us: I will be wearing Wedeln Gear (blue vest with logo - maybe a fashionable hat)
item.name: Wisecracks Comedy @ Jose Murphy's Worcester
